title: What are some movies the world is better off without? - Quora

response.answer_text: Michael Moore’s documentaries. His heart may be in the right place, but he took a few too many ‘creative liberties’ in his presentation, which continues to provide a legitimate thing for folks to point to as ‘proof’ of the whole paranoid ‘fake news’ thing.

If there were no comic book superhero movies the children who enjoy a religious like zeal with them might just find something productive to do with their time. Anything is possible, however improbable.
